text: Kamen Rider Saber is a Japanese tokusatsu drama Kamen Rider Franchise. ==Schedule== Super Hero Time joined Mashin Sentai Kiramager and later, Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger. ==Cast== * Touma Kamiyama / Kamen Rider Saber: Syuichiro Naito * Rintaro Shindo / Kamen Rider Blades: Takuya Yamaguchi * Mei Sudo: Asuka Kawazu * Kento Fukamiya / Kamen Rider Espada: Ryo Aoki * Ryo Ogami / Kamen Rider Buster: Yuki Ikushima * Ren Akamichi / Kamen Rider Kenzan: Eiji Togashi * Tetsuo Daishinji / Kamen Rider Slash: Hideaki Oka * Yuri / Kamen Rider Saikou: Tomohiro Ichikawa * Reika Shindai / Kamen Rider Sabela: Angela Mei * Ryoga Shindai / Kamen Rider Durendal: Ken Shonozaki * Isaac / Kamen Rider Solomon, Original Master Logos: Keisuke Sohma * Storious / Kamen Rider Storious: Robin Furuya * Legeiel: Kyle Takano * Zooous: Koji Saikawa * Luna: Miku Okamoto (Child), Mayuu Yokota (Adult) * Sora Ogami: Tenta Banka * Tassel: Tobi * Daichi Kajimo / Kamen Rider Saber: Hiroyuki Hirayama * Sophia / Kamen Rider Calibur, Another Sophia, Priestess: Rina Chinen * Bahato / Kamen Rider Falchion: Masashi Taniguchi * Desast (Voice): Kōki Uchiyama * Charybids (Voice): Ryōta Iwasaki * Seiken Rider System Singing Voice: Eizo Sakamoto * Kamen Rider Sabela's Equipment Voice: Miyu Fukuda * Narration, Seiken Rider System Speaking Voice, Wonder Ride Books Voice: Akio Ōtsuka ===Guest cast=== * Hayato Fukamiya / Kamen Rider Calibur (5, 15, 38, 45): Mitsuru Karahashi * Kenshin Nagamine / Kamen Rider Blades (7, 32): Masashi Mikami * Men (8): Ryo Matsuda, Metal Yoshida * Yuki Shirai (16-19, 28, 44, 47): Hitomi Hasebe * Married couple (16): Hideyoshi Iwata, Mayu Iwata * Zocks Goldtsuiker (SP): Atsuki Mashiko * Haruka Ogami (44, 47): Arisa Nakajima * Ikki Igarashi / Kamen Rider Revi (Special Issue): Kentaro Maeda * George Karizaki (Special Issue): Noritaka Hamao * Otreca (Voice; Special Issue): Hayata Seki * Vice / Kamen Rider Vice (Voice; Special Issue): Saburu Kimura * Revice Equipment Voice (Special Issue): Shingo Fujimori ===Sword of Logos Saga cast=== * Kyoichiro Shinsen / Kamen Rider Espada: Kazuaki Ishii * Amane Kagami / Kamen Rider Kenzan: Erena Mizusawa ===Super Hero Senki cast=== * Shotaro Ishinomori: Fuku Suzuki ===Final Stage cast=== * Tassel / Kamen Rider Tassel (Voice): Tobi ===Trio of Deep Sin cast=== * Mamiya / Kamen Rider Falchion: Ryo Kimura * Yuina Tachibana / Kamen Rider Falchion: Rin Asuka * Shinjiro Shinozaki / Kamen Rider Falchion: Satoshi Hashimoto * Riku: Kiara Minegishi * Younger Riku: Tōma Matsubara ===Theme songs=== ; Opening theme * "ALMIGHTY ~Kamen no Yakusoku feat. Yoohei Kawakami" ("ALMIGHTY ~The Masked Promise feat. Yoohei Kawakami") ** Lyrics: Atsushi Yanaka ** Composition: Tsuyoshi Kawakami ** Artist & Arrangement: Tokyo Ska Paradise Orchestra ** Vocal & Lyrics (English Translation): Yoohei Kawakami ; Ending theme * "Kamen Rider Saber" ** Lyrics: Atsushi Yanaka ** Composition: Takashi Kato ** Artist & Arrangement: Tokyo Ska Paradise Orchestra ** Vocals: Kinichi Motegi ; Insert themes * "Rewrite the story" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: tatsuo ** Artist: Syuichiro Naito, Takuya Yamaguchi, & Ryo Aoki ** Episodes: 38-40 * "Will save us" ** Lyrics: Shio Watanabe, Kazuya Kamihoriuchi ** Composition: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Asuka Kawazu ** Episodes: 43 * "The story never ends" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: Kousuke Yamashita ** Artist: Rina Chinen ** Episodes: 44 * "BOOK OF POWER" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: tatsuo ** Artist: Masanori Kobayashi (WARROCK) ** Episodes: 45 * "Timeless story" ** Lyrics: Isa Takinoo ** Composition: Kousuke Yamashita ** Artist: Utabito Zanmai Samady ** Episodes: 45, 47 * "Bittersweet" ** Performed by: Asuka Kawazu, Syuichiro Naito, Takuya Yamaguchi, & Ryo Aoki Category:2020 establishments in Japan Category:2020 television series debuts Category:2021 disestablishments in Asia Category:2021 television series endings Category:Japanese science fiction television series
title: Kamen Rider Saber
